alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 01 at 5:49PM AKST until January 02 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST MONDAY... * WHAT...High winds and blowing snow occuring with visibility reduced to one half mile or less at times. Northeast winds gusting 50 to 60 mph. * WHERE...The Bering Strait Coast including Little Diomede, Wales and Brevig Mission. * WHEN...Until 6 PM AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult. Areas of blowing snow will significantly reduce the visibility. Large snow drifts will form. Building could be damaged.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
